CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 26, 1953, pg. 3 reads: "New City Advertising Manager - When Erroll B. Davis, former assistant manager of the Pittsburgh branch office of North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company, took over his duties as city edition advertising manager at the Courier on Monday, Sept. 14, members of the Courier business and advertising staff welcomed him to the fold. Here the group talks over advertising plans with Mr. Davis.  Seated, left to right: W. Clyde Page, promotion manager; Russell Washington, assistant business manager; Erroll B. Davis and Earl V. Hord, Courier general manager.  Standing: James Drake, promotion artist; Mal Goode, Courier newscaster and advertising solocitor [sic]; John B. Johnson and Frank Lavelle, advertising solicitors. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men, seated from left: W. Clyde Page, Russell Washington, Erroll B. Davis, Earl V. Hord; standing: James Drake, Mal Goode, John B. Johnson, and Frank Lavelle, posed around table looking at enlarged map, in interior of Pittsburgh Courier newspaper office
